Reviews.Title: “Location..location..location”
Reviews.Author: pokeyboy
Reviews.Content: The only thing why I picked this hotel because reasonable price at ORCHAD area. I stayed here for my ex girlfriend (now my wife) cousin wedding reception at Marriott Hotel. Can u feel it? we stayed at Grand Central and then we went to Marriott hotel and have a hotel tour, we looked at the hotel decoration and stayed a while at my cousin's room, we have dinner at my cousin ceremony in Marriott Ballroom and then we have to go back to our little sad room..how cruel life can be? About the hotel, I must say the Grand Central is old hotel with great location. There are several store in the back of reception area (Back of the hotel area); cheap salon, cheap restaurant with unpleasant owner, and others cheap...cheap store..oh, I just remember, there is an Indian luggage and souvenir store in there..my friend bought luggage at that store.. I wont talk about the room, you all know from the reviewer below me... Yes, the room is not nice, yes, the room is like your grandma underwear, yes, they have problem with AC, yes, the bathroom is suck But look at the bright side...hmm..can't think any Ooo... oo...as I said before, Location I have interesting story about the diner behind the receptionist area, It was 8-9 AM in the morning, I were with my gf and crap...a couple with 2 naughty kids, we felt hungry and the mall beside the hotel hasn't opened yet, so the best thing we could find is a diner which is still in the hotel, the back of hotel exactly, anyway we had breakfast in there and then after we finished eating, we still sit at the chair and the owner..a 50 y.o lady is yelling at us...Hey, Pay first!!!! We felt insulted, do I look like a person who wont pay for my breakfast? and then my GF yelling back, We will pay, do we look like someone who wont pay for the food? and then she talking nice to us, treat us nice but we can tell she is a very fierce person by the way she treated her personnel (a 60 y.o woman) Moral of this story : Never have breakfast So, If you mind dealing with poor hotel in the great location, choose this hotel. Happy holiday!!

Reviews.Title: “Location is the only thing going...”
Reviews.Author: eric p
Reviews.Content: For the amount you pay for this hotel you would expect basic cleanliness. The rooms are old and worn, the washroom was dingy and moldy and the air con smelled. The only good thing about this hotel was its proximity to Orchard Street.

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever! Can't believe my eyes!”
Reviews.Author: helbanes
Reviews.Content: I thought this hotel would at least be clean since their price is comparable to a 3-star hotel (and yes, they're a 3-star hotel by the way). For S$200/night, this hotel is a nightmare! I bet the owner has not visited his/her hotel for decades now! The aircon has no control switch, the bathroom tiles are filled with molds, the shower is rusty, and the toilet bowl drips water to the floor yuck! I feel like I'm cheated with the price I paid. The breakfast are the same everyday (eggs, sausage, bread, rice, potato wedges). There are no free wi-fi, you need to pay S$6/2hours! The TV has less than 10 cable channels. This hotel ruined my Singapore experience!

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother - staying at backpackers would be cheaper and cleaner”
Reviews.Author: GazandMaz
Reviews.Content: This is the second worst hotel I've stayed at in all my years of travel - the worst was in Malta! We stayed in their premium suite but it was as basic as the worst of backpackers. We knew it was going to be bad when we got into the elevator and tiles of the elevator were torn and dirty and we couldn't get the electronic pass to take us to our floor. Then it got worse. Everything about this place is dirty - quite unusual for the high standards of Singapore. In fact Singapore streets were cleaner than this place! Our first room was disgusting and the airconditioner rattled wheezed sounding like we were on the tarmac of an airport. There was hair all over the duve cover. There was nothing in the fridge not even a bottle of water, yet we were asked to put a $50 deposit! After complaining we were upgraded to the premium suits - and the carpet was soaked from the condensation of the airconditioner, which didn't work the entire time we were there eventhough we asked it to be fixed. The shower sprayed the entire bathroom when the water was turned on with little water directed to the person taking the shower. Subsequently the towels were continually soaked and had to be placed outside the bathroom before showering. The toilet didn't flush correctly and took one hour to refill the water in the cistern. We could not face eating breakfast as it was a large mess hall that was entered by exiting the hotel proper. It was unclean, with poor quality food and no staff to clean tables. Large school excursion groups were staying whilst we were there so you can imagine what the breakfast room looked and sounded like. That was the quality of the place - a level up from a school camp! Reception staff was all sour faced and unhelpful. I can imagine the number of complaints they must deal with daily no wonder they were complacent when we approached them about the standard of the room. Again, this should be rated as backpacker accommodation and poor one at that.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from this hotel from hell !”
Reviews.Author: Olivia T
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I booked a deluxe room through Agoda at the last minute for £65 instead of £145. When we arrived at the hotel, the receptionist annonced to us that we have been upragted to the superior room because the hotel was pretty full. So we were pretty happy until we arrived to our room, we couldn't believe how dirty it was. The toilet was so filthy with splash of wee everywhere, mould on all the bathroom, dust everywhere, ripped carpet, bad smells and a big motorway was behind our room, so very noisy at night. i'm a backpacker and i traveled around the world, i stayed in tiny huts on the beach for £5 who was much cleaner. PLEASE stay away from this hotel !!!! There are better places to stay much cheaper and much cleaner in the little India area, only 5 minutes on taxi from Orchard road. We wanted a good hotel for our stay in Singapore, what a WASTE of money.

Reviews.Title: “Very basic hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: RiffatNH
Reviews.Content: Located in the heart of the city, Orchard Street, great location if you are on a shopping spree with a budget. The toilet was slightly dirty, the rooms are old fashioned with LCD TV. Not much channels on the tv either. And of all the bad things, the worst was the rude and unfriendly staff. The room service never understood a word of English and did not bother to help either.For USD 166 per night, I expected a bit better rooms and service. Except for the fantastic location, I would not recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “very poor hotel”
Reviews.Author: JD P
Reviews.Content: I've never seen a bathroom so dirty ! There is no free Wifi ! It's a very bads hotel .

Reviews.Title: “Far from grand!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rita n
Reviews.Content: I went to Singapore with a group of 6 people, stayed in Grand Central for 4 nights The rooms and toilets was dirty, one of the rooms even had mould growing under the side table I had to ask for a transfer to another room The only good point is the location near orchard road

Reviews.Title: “if comfortable sleeping is not your priority....”
Reviews.Author: Putri A
Reviews.Content: I've been staying at this hotel twice, first in July 2010 and then the latest was October 2011. it's not that im a big fans of this hotel but since my trip to singapore always been a shopping trip so, according to location and the price of the room (compare to any other hotels on orchard road), this hotel always be my 'best' choice. receptionists are fine, i mean, typical singaporean. i wont say much about the room, it is exactly as the other reviewers said; stinky, old fashion, etc etc.. also the bed is such pain, it is so hard i could hurt my back. the breakfast is poor too. so, i would NOT recommend this hotel for comfort, location is great, but if you're willing, i'd say pay a lil bit more for a lil more comfort :)

Reviews.Title: “The worst Hotel ever experienced!!”
Reviews.Author: DaveS777
Reviews.Content: If location is everything not even that will sway you to stay in this Hotel!! mould throughout the bathroom and rust stains in the tub, bed bugs in the beds and and thin walls, door and windows allow you to hear the prositutes outside hawking their wares all night!! not to mention noise in the hallways outside. We were booked in for 3 nights and left the first morning - wouldnt have stayed 1 night if we didnt have to but got in after 10pm so no choice.... This hotel needs to be shut down as its a health and fire hazzard!! Staff dont care at all and didnt seem surprised we checked out first day. Appears to cater for mainland China guests who perhaps dont realise they are getting ripped off. How many Hotels have a sign in the lobby indicating no pets or cooking in rooms allowed - there are no kitchens in the rooms!!

Reviews.Title: “Average Rooms, bad Indian food .The only good part was we got it cheap & tours organised well”
Reviews.Author: Gurprit S
Reviews.Content: I visited the Grand Central, Singapore a few months back with my family but was not satisfied. It is at walking distance on Orchard road and at a short walk from major MRT station. Hotel and rooms- hotel is undoubtedly at best locations as suggested by www.antilogvacations.com. Staff was not good at hospitality. Infact ,The only saving grace was the cheap rates & good services by Antilog Vacations.We selected this hotel so can’t blame them as they gave us as many as 5 other options & told about this property cautiously.. But Anyways Rooms were good enough with double ac and fine bed. Toilets and bathrooms were a big time trouble for us, dirty and stained. The shower nozzle threw water everywhere except where it was required. The bathroom floor flooded every time as water ran off the edges of the bathtub and across the floor. There was only one window which opens to some corridor. We felt like we live in a tunnel or something..At the buffet breakfast dining hall, again there was no cleanliness; the glasses kept were of plastic. Breakfast services can be improved. Refills took a long time. Poor supervision during peak breakfast hour. Some of the photos make this place look reasonable however takes note of the dirt and grime in some. I took photos however the existing shots on record here in Trip Advisor are sufficient the advantage of having a good location definitely doesn’t outweigh the disadvantages of the shabby rooms. I'm sure there are many other hotels in the same area that offer a whole lot more service and cleanliness for the same price. ..Our Bad Luck.. Over all an average experience of hotel but good experience of tours

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is old,dirty and substandard for price paid,saving grace is location”
Reviews.Author: 2012Eileen
Reviews.Content: This is a 1 star hotel in prime location charging above value charges. Should have got the hint when taxi driver when he said it was a very.. Old hotel. The 1st room we paid for was a premium room.Walked in and instantly smelt as someone had been cooking food,bath tub rusted and dirty with mould on ceilings. A complaint to front desk got us moved to the 8th Superior room.Guess what? Same style and quality room as 1st room. Issues were rusted bath,mould on ceilings,fixtures 15 yrs plus old,carpet dirty so could not take off shoes.Plus beds were so hard that you felt as you were sleeping on a plank of wood. On travel companions stayed in a room similar but experienced a night with little sleep as air conditioning was full blast as thermastat was broken with card board over half of vent. Paid for a breakfast which was held in some third world dinning room with plastic cups,plastic covers on round clustered tables in smelly room.Only eat there once in our two night stay as didnt want to get food poisoning from lack of cleanliness. If you leave your luggage expect it to sit in the foyer tied together by string. Location is good as great foot massage facilities across the road.At the top of Orchid plaza across the road, great restauants around 8th floor. Word of advise,find another hotel in Singapore to stay at.

Reviews.Title: “ain't worth it”
Reviews.Author: MM S
Reviews.Content: cheapest hotel on Orchard Road, great location but for that money, it isn't worth it.. if you are looking for something cheap, try hotels a bit further out, S'pore is a small place and getting around in town is easy

Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Grace8808
Reviews.Content: This is the cheapest hotel we can find in Orchard Road. Stayed here for 1 night only. Checked-in at 10am and we left our luggages in the room which are to be cleaned up later. The room was big, bed was comfy, but the toilet & bathtub looked a bit uncleaned with old stains. Shower water was very small, which is a bit annoying. The bathtub is using the traditional knob to adjust the water hot/cold. Location was superb, once out from the hotel you can see all the big malls from street-to-street, which you can shop like crazy. As this hotel is located near to the far end of orchard road, the walk to the central shopping areas like paragon, takashimaya, ion orchard,etc took around 10mins walk. If you are plan to visit other parts of singapore like clarke quay, bugis, expo, etc. You can walk to the Summerset MRT (5mins walk) which is located inside the 313@ summerset mall. Superly convenient to tour around Singapore. Will definitely choose this hotel in my next shopping trip.

Reviews.Title: “Central Location ~ Minutes from Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: Newo
Reviews.Content: Excellent location minutes from Orchard road. Short walk to major MRT station. Clean comfortable room and good choice breakfast. Recommend it and stayed again First visit was March 2006.

Reviews.Title: “nice place at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: edkhor
Reviews.Content: 3star price within orchard road and all the shopping amenities !!! rooms maybe a little worn but if you wouldnt mind saving on paying for rooms and more for shopping this is the place to stay ...

Reviews.Title: “Avoid if possible”
Reviews.Author: ap21959
Reviews.Content: the basic room are very bad and one can't stay there. the rooms are very old, the decor is very basic and may not have been refurbished since a long time. The bathtub, etc are worn out. There is also no service in the room. The room had no glasses to drink water. the house keeping informed that there are glasses in stock. At the buffet breakfast dining hall, there is not much cleanliness, the glasses kept are of plastic, the way the food was served is below the 3 star category, what the hotel is tagged at. Refills took a long time. No supervision during peak breakfast hour. The only consolation is location. Otherwise there is a scope for terrific improvement.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Terrible Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Andrew B
Reviews.Content: Firstly start with the Pro's or should i say pro... Location is great, right on Orchard Road. Hawkers Market across the street is great for a chilli crab (although try not to send the shell flying across to the next table as i did) Con's... Reception at check in were not very helpful nor friendly, took a while to find our room as had no instruction on how to get there. Got to room which was in very poor condition, smelt wet and bathroom was disgusting. Bed was rock hard and sheets were dirty. Not what you expect when you pay for an advertised hotel of this standard. Breakfast was ok however did felt like it was a mess hall. Would NOT stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Recommend only for the location”
Reviews.Author: Indikakandy
Reviews.Content: Only thing that was good about this hotel was the location. primly located within few meters from Orchard Road.The room was small and old. It was cleaned once a day. There was no control for the A/C and one of the previous occupants and closed the vents with duck tape, paper and diapers. The bed was not comfortable at all and there was no opening to outside. There was only one window which opens to some corridor. We felt like we live in a tunnel or something Thankfully we did not stayed in the room for that long cause we had a packed day. Usually we left the hotel at 8.30 am and came back only at late night. If you are thinking to stay in the hotel for a while definitely not the place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!!!!!!!!!!1”
Reviews.Author: ankurmittal04
Reviews.Content: The hotel is really great with all facilities. the staff is cooperative and friendly. Rooms are cleans and hygenic with all modern amenities.we stayed here for 3 nights and was a peaceful stay. The hotel is situated at central location which is reachable through all major joints and one can take a walk also to reach your destination

Reviews.Title: “Should be closed down until major refurbishment”
Reviews.Author: Cameron C
Reviews.Content: Stayed 1 night on way to Sydney and 2 nights on way back. Unfortunate had to travel at time of F1 and hotel choice limited. Have transitted thro' S'pore on many occasions in past but never had hotel as poor as this. Room(s) in need of major upgrade, poor sound insulation, indifferent staff, breakfast not worth eating, beware scam with mini-bar drinks - at checkout suggested we had had 2 bottles of beer which refused to pay; breakfast served with plastic plates and cups All in all, a hotel to avoid and an embarassment to S'pore tourism industry. Have stayed in cleaner and better value hotels in Thailand, Borneo, Cambodia, Loas & Vietnam in the recent past.

Reviews.Title: “CHOOSE ANOTHER HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: BroomeAussies
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights in September 2011. It was a poor choice made due to an extended stay in Singapore resulting from illness and unable to fly. We would not stay here again and certainly cannot recommend it to anyone. Some of the photos make this place look reasonable however take note of the dirt and grime in some. I took photos however the existing shots on record here in Trip Advisor are sufficIent. The bathroom/toilet area was very dirty, old and the timber around the door frame was rotten. All the wall paint around the airconditioner outlet had peeled away due to moisture and there was buIlt up ingrained dirt all over the soap holder over the bath. The shower nozzle made its own arrangements and fired everywhere except where it was required. The bathroom floor flooded avery time as the water ran off the edge of the bath and across the floor. No amount of trying could prevent this and we used up many towels. We also noted that we were the only caucasian faces at this hotel. Almost all others were Asian not that it was a problem just interesting. Don't ask for anything like extra tea or coffee. All you get is "sorry housekeeping is not available". The tea & coffee unfortunately is premixed and sweetened. Too bad if you don't take sugar. Traffic noise from the nearby freeway was very loud until very late about 1am and started again very early around 5am. There are much better hotels just 50m away at similar prices. Try The Holiday Inn or the Concord both are great.

Reviews.Title: “discriminated guest by receptionists”
Reviews.Author: sbysteve
Reviews.Content: Bad hotel... if your performance just like a tourist .... stay away. If you wear suit with branded bag, you can have room straight away...even at 6 am They have plenty of rooms because it just like a budget hotel for tour and travel agent, which bring their guests late at night and depart early in the morning. All the room is smoking room and vary basic amenities, the toilet can not flush well, the carpet is full of stain, lots of ants, the bed is hard, though they have double air condition and made the room temperature cold. Everything just like short time hotels. So ... if you want to stay in Orchard road for a night and your airlines arrived early in the morning and no other hotel to stay... just wear your best suit and you will got a room instantly.

Reviews.Title: “HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED....!!!”
Reviews.Author: MelPra
Reviews.Content: bad hospitality.....bad hotel...bad rooms...the receptionists are BAD....HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED....I regret staying here and WILL NOT COME BACK even for free stays... Guys...BE AWARE....!!!!

Reviews.Title: “bad room, bad internet facilities, very bad customer service, NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!”
Reviews.Author: yohanes s
Reviews.Content: 1 September 2011--> i stayed here, n i think, i never back here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Biggest disgrace to Singapore, don't even think about it!”
Reviews.Author: VH_777
Reviews.Content: WORST HOTEL EVER. Leaking ceilings, showers from the 18th century, the carpets stink (it can cause nausea), smallest TV ever, put the smallest snack or food on the table and within 5 minutes you have it filled with ants, and when you enter the hotel with a bag there's no one to help you. Even the breakfast was unpleasant. A BIG WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME. Even though it has one of the best locations in orchard, the room would just make you sick. The advantages of having a good location definitely doesn't outweigh the disadvantages of the HORRIBLE room. I'm sure there are MANY other hotels in orchard that offer a whole lot more service and cleanliness for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Orchard Bargain with Crappy Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Julsediaz
Reviews.Content: Close to OG's on Orchard this is surely a bargain. However the rooms need to be renovated. The room i got was a non smoking dump with broken toilet fittings. After serious complaining they upgraded me to a 9th floor room which was still not upto Singapore standards. I hope the management does something about this in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A black Mark to Singapor...”
Reviews.Author: prafilaash
Reviews.Content: Check in was terrible... The most untidy hotel room I have ever seen... Smelly rooms... Filthy bathrooms... No internet access... Awkward term & conditions for Internet usage.... Totally a disappointing & horrified experience... Tourist beware of this filthy hotel....

Reviews.Title: “good location, bad hotel room”
Reviews.Author: sonmezocak
Reviews.Content: the only thing to say about this otel was its excellent location.it is so closed to the orchard road, metro station..but there's no wifi,staff was terrible and the room smells homidity.. but i must say again the location is excellent...

Reviews.Title: “Very unpleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: Pilgrim88
Reviews.Content: Considering the rate of almost US$300 a night, we thought this must be a luxury hotel, FAARRR.. from it. The bathroom is old and dirty, toilet flush was not working properly, the attendants are not friendly and somewhat rude. We couldn't sleep well, we stayed at the eight floor, yet the noice and the shouting of people on the street level was loudly heard all night. This terrible hotel experience make us not wanting to go back to Singapore. It really spoiled our vacation time!!

Reviews.Title: “Staying at Hotel grand central in a tour organized by Kuoni/SOTC was very bad experience, rooms having crockroaches”
Reviews.Author: shankargarg
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Grand Central from 1st June 2011 to 4th June 2011. We were more than 80 people from India and tour was organized by Kuoni/SOTC of India. We had a very very bad experience of Hotel as well as of tour operators. The rooms were having crockroaches even at bed and people could not sleep. Reception and front desk services were very poor. Breakfast was having no variety and they served limited food. Tea/Coffee maker was there in room but there were no milk, sugar and coffee/tea pouches. Two bottles of drinking water per person were also not provided. Everything was in terrible shape and the experience with hotel grand central as well as with Kuoni/SOTC,India was horrible. I will say no one should make a group travel with SOTC/Kuoni of Mumbai, India and one should not stay at Hotel Grand Central at all.

Reviews.Title: “Good location,decent room, pricey rate, below average Front desk and porter service.”
Reviews.Author: WChanBangkok
Reviews.Content: We booked months ahead as a business convention group, payigng slightly higher Corporate rates. The reservation officer gave adequate standard of service. However on arrival, the check in process was slow and full of mistakes. Although the advance rooming list was in their hands, the reception staff haven't a clue the number of rooms reserved and tnhe joiner and pax per room allocation. They were rude and loud and treated my business men group like a tour group and gave really bad service. The porter was just as bad and did not assist with our bags on arrival and departure citing that the tour agency did not arrange porterage. They failed to understand that no tour agency was involved. The entire hotel was ruined by junior staff with no supervisor or management to assist when we requested for one. Breakast was substandard bad value. The room was comfortable and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Very Standard,just for sleep still ok”
Reviews.Author: Tsa_RyszardMom
Reviews.Content: My sister & I took a short trip for a shooping spree in singapore. As we are ini tight budget so we try to stay in this hotel. Location is ok,near food & lots of shooping center. Room with no view,the knob is broken so the water cant stop whereas the toilet had difficulties to flush. Check in & check out no fuss. Hotel incl breakfast which we didnt go the next day, even the egg is not edible. they refuse to give us a spare room key in term they claim their hotel rate is super cheap. I would recommend for short stay not with children. But maybe should check out YMCA instead,atleast better service.

Reviews.Title: “fair enough”
Reviews.Author: coolmodjo
Reviews.Content: stayed here with my family, we booked three rooms.. positive: very good locations surrounded with hawker foods, cheap foods, malls and near to sommerset mrt. seems like they have renovated the rooms.. and good price too in comparison with other hotels in orchard. negative: the aircon was not working properly in my room, since no more room left, so i had to sleep there. the hotel looks so old, the pool not good enough, and a little bit dirty in the pool area.

Reviews.Title: “An okay three star hotel”
Reviews.Author: AshaHegde
Reviews.Content: We had been to the hotel in July 2010 with family. The booking was done through our travel agent. We didnt have to wait for long for the rooms. The reception guy though was allotting us a different room first than the ones allotted, but later made us the right rooms available. The hotel room was neat and clean, though not very spacious. However, the breakfast options were very limited. And the crowd at the restaurant for the breakfast starts right at 6am! The items in the casseroles were never filled in, when they became empty. Fruits were always in scarcity. For us vegetarians, there was hardly any option except bread and cereals. Overall, it was a so-so experience!

Reviews.Title: “Location matters…”
Reviews.Author: Symon_Imran
Reviews.Content: As hotel is situated central point of the city we stayed there. I was afraid that how busy their reception is, they even not bother what I trying to say. I booked the hotel through the email but I was not ask about breakfast visa versa they also didn’t remind me at all, and finally I fall in a false position. Most of the time elevator man was not out there, so when I came down from the room without key, as my wife was in the room and they gave only one key, in that case very tough to go upstairs. Ultimately service people were not cooperative, rooms need the real renovation. As if I was in an army camp & I have to stay with their command, otherwise I can leave as they don’t have lack of guests. But all that and more the hotel is in a good location.

Reviews.Title: “Embarrassing”
Reviews.Author: NatureHigh
Reviews.Content: I was in Singapore for a business trip and we were booked in this hotel. My, my, it was really bad. What are these guys thinking? The doors of the rooms are ugly. I could hear the conversations in the next room. The whole place has a funky smell. I could not even charge my internet to my room and I was made to walk to a money changer down the street to change my cash into Singapore dollars so that I could purchase an internet card. The service is really no service at all. Thankfully, the trip was quick and I had to stay a night only.

Reviews.Title: “Speechless.”
Reviews.Author: mbe_thaiwah
Reviews.Content: What can I say? The housekeeping staff never washed our glasses. We went back to our room every night to find our used glasses were left unattended. Empty liquid soap bottles were never taken away but left unattended at the bath tub. My son also found stained mucus on the hotel's new towel. Men's room in the lobby also was unbelieveably dirty. I guarantee public restrooms elsewhere in Singapore are much cleaner. It really is a pity this hotel situates in Singapore!!

Reviews.Title: “I suppose you get what you pay for although at $250 sing, I expected a bit more.”
Reviews.Author: chrisj28
Reviews.Content: Friends didn't book us a room so we had to use the airport hotel booking service at Changi. They sent us to a hotel n upon arrival there was mo available rooms so we were sent to Grand Central. There should b a name change to Lousy Central. The lobby wad depressing n the room smelled as we walked in. The chairs were worn out n dirty looking m grubby. The bathroom had wobbly taps n fiddly shower. Carpet looked dirty. The saving grace was that the bed had good clean white sheets. We tried to get the airport reservation center to change our hotel but the lady was unhelpful. She told us she would but she would suggest hotels to us without checking availability. We had to call her constantly cos she would not call us although she said she would. She was unprofessional and even laughed at our situation. In the end we gave up.

Reviews.Title: “Insects infested”
Reviews.Author: Sydney-sider_ML
Reviews.Content: This hotel is quite old and solely needs renovating. My first room was infested with small ant-like insects on all the furniture and bedding, and I had to change rooms in the middle of the night. The staff and level of service is passable, and they changed my room immediately without questions, but they are not very friendly and the reception & concierge refused to help me with my luggage or even to call a cab. But the location is very central, just off Orchard Road and the price is good for the area.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel considering comfort and location...”
Reviews.Author: bong_11
Reviews.Content: so far this hotel is the most affordable in orchard road...its just few min walk to malls. we really enjoyed our stay there for 2 nights. service is good, receptionist were very polite and accomodating...our only comment is that the room is a bit old . glass window should be cleaned and polish .... but overeall comfortable to stay.....

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Service”
Reviews.Author: lifestylenetwork
Reviews.Content: This hotel sucks in service.... People here don't even SMILE! except for the girl on the Tour Desk. She was awesome and so friendly even accommodating. If people in the hotel were like her, I would give this hotel a higher rating but NO... too bad. The staff don't even explain the dos and don'ts in the hotel, before you know it they'll charge you for the phone call even if its within the city... GOSH! They indicate food in the fridge but when you open it... there's not even one food there... Not even a complimentary drink! They have poor comprehension in English language. So be very careful when you want something, they charge it. Moral lesson, if you want a good service, stay in a 5-star hotel. I just don't get it, why rate this a 3-star hotel. Service sucks! Food at the breakfast hall lacks taste...

Reviews.Title: “terrible stay”
Reviews.Author: anupamkh
Reviews.Content: i hd to go to singapore for business , so my travel agent suggested me to go to Grand central as it was close to orchid road and cheap. its is 3 star hotel. i reluctantly went there bt my experience was very bad as there was very less variety in buffet breakfast, towels in bathroom wer dirty and airconditioning was not proper (a/c didnt hv control to slow it, so i gt cold due to high a/c). repeated requests was in vain. manager did nt change the room so i changed to orchard parade after stayg ther for 2 days.. avoid stayg there. travel agents force u to stay there , sayg tht it is good bcos they get good margins fm this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bad Service and Noisy Room”
Reviews.Author: dalozt
Reviews.Content: I was staying in the Hotel in January. The best location to stay as it was near orchard road the busiest road in Singapore. But I receive bad welcome as the reception was not friendly. They threat you as if you are applying for a job. They do not care at all about your long trip to get there. Furthermore we stay on floor that has swimming pool and our room near the pool. We could not get rest as in the afternoon people were talking very loudly, screaming and running around in the corridor. One positive thing is the concierge was friendly. The room is very old and a bit dump(smells like wet carpet) but we were satisfied as the hotel located very close to food court and orchard road.

Reviews.Title: “Old rooms, indifferent service”
Reviews.Author: FarNM
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a delux suite...The rooms here are old but clean, so if u are not going to be in the hotl most of the day this hotel is fine. The breakfast buffet is very crowded with no wide selection of food..The service was indifferent except the very sweet lady at the tour desk. The counter girl gave us the key to an occupied room during chek in and we had a guest ask us "Room service?" ..also, the bathrooms are small and old...OK hotel...just OK...By the way...The location is very good...in the busy shopping Orchard street.

Reviews.Title: “The only good thing about the hotel is that it's close to Orchard Rd”
Reviews.Author: De1955
Reviews.Content: Definitely wouldn't stay at this hotel again. Not worth it for the price you pay. The beds were comfortable, but the rooms had a strange smell & the floors weren't very clean. The rooms were very cold & AC couldn't be adjusted. Breakfast was very poor. Not a good selection & not very appealing. Wouldn't want to have paid for it. The pool was quite good for somewhere to relax. The only good thing about the hotel is it's location,close to shops & Somerset MRT.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I have ever experienced”
Reviews.Author: Perth2010
Reviews.Content: Simply Do not go there. It should not be called Hotel. Check in service was bad. Rooms was bad. No loppy to even have a seat. When I asked for a late check out, the response was "even for half an hour you have to pay extra" I even asked if I could check out and leave my bag at safe, they said it would be under my own responsibility if it gets stolen.

Reviews.Title: “worst experience”
Reviews.Author: SMAMANIA
Reviews.Content: never stay in this hotel it is waste of money only good thing about this hotel is that it is located nr orchard road. the room we stayed in had a very tiny window the bathroom was very ugly and not clean this hotel is said to be a 3 star hotel but we wouldn't even put it in category of a ldge we will not recommend anyone to take this hotel this hotel doesnt have a restaurant even they serve the breakfast in some odd room on the top of the hotel very pathetic

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Reasonable Price”
Reviews.Author: HTChew
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located between Dhoby Ghaut and Somerset MRT (less than 1.5 km walk) . Its location is superb with lots of shopping and interesting places to hang out. Within a few minutes walk, it brings you to the nearby Orchard Road mega shopping malls. Beside MRT, the buses services is just some 100m away and you could easily jump into one with your EzLink Card. The room is clean and quiet which you will definitely enjoy a wonderful sleep without disturbance. On the downside, for those of you who are parking your cars at the basement, the hotel charges $10 per day. And there is no lift to bring you up to the ground level hotel lobby. The hotel staffs are just averagely friendly. With the price of below $200 per night for a superb location (i.e. along Ochard Road), I guess this is one of the best deals you could get.

Reviews.Title: “Insects - Cockroach - scattered in the room”
Reviews.Author: saaf1
Reviews.Content: Good hotel location, as well as improve resident safety and hygiene is generally good, but there is room in insects and cockroaches are not normal, even on the bed, but everywhere in the room.

Reviews.Title: “The only thing I like about this hotel is its location”
Reviews.Author: kyapjoco
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights on a business trip. Centrally located in Singapore so it's easy to get around. Also very convenient if you're doing some shopping along Orchard Road's malls and shopping centers. There is also a food court and some hawker stalls right across the hotel if you don't want to eat food from the hotel's kitchen. Breakfast food not exactly the best but will get you through the morning. Rooms aren't clean. There was some unswept dirt underneath the coffee table. Beds are old and no longer firm. If you're looking for a good night's sleep at the end of each day, skip this hotel. There is no temperature control inside the room. In general, the hotel is quite old so you can't expect much.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay - Heart of City - Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: saso1310
Reviews.Content: It was my fourth trip to Singapore. I stayed at this hotel as it was selected by my Singapore office for my stay. o my pleasure, it was really an unforgatable experience to stay at there. My stay was for two weeks and it was really pleasent and memorable. The rooms are elegant with alla accessories and toiletories available in the room as standard package. cleanliness was really good. Staff was grooming and warmth and helpful. The food was really enjoyable and with Continental, asian and european cousine. Main strong point of this hotel is Location - Orchard road - Heart of city and most happening place of Singapore. In the evening you can just get out of hotel and roam around to kill the time. It was really a nice experience with typical Singapore warmth and helpfulness. Sachin.

Reviews.Title: “Average 3* hotel - good location”
Reviews.Author: Biswajit66
Reviews.Content: Positives: Excellent location [one end of Orchard road] in central Singapore. There is a food court just adjacent to the hotel where all types [Japanese, Korean, Thai, Indian] of food is available [one can have a decent meal at S$5-6 without frills]. One can even have proper veg meals in the food court. The staff were helpful - but not always courteous... Negatives: The check-in time is 3 PM. If you arrive by an early morning flight - be prepared to get your room late..!. The hotel will take some 'caution money' from you during check-in only to return it to you while you check-out. The amount is ~ S$50 for 6 day stay [& S$100 for a 14 day stay...!]. The rooms are of average cleanliness. The TV has only 8-10 channels...! The internet is chargeable. Bathroom tap leaked. The toilet flush worked with some reluctance..The shower curtains have stains. The buffet breakfast is a struggle [very crowded with people almost jostling for food]. The breakfast room have tables with 8 chairs...! So - at crowded times you have to sit with strangers...!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel how good? "OK"”
Reviews.Author: alagesh_kumar
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Singapore in this hotel for 2 days. When we entered the room it was actually big and looked good. But after exploring we found out the bathroom was in a very bad state. The shower was leaking and the toilet looked pathatic. We had a good night sleep. The buffet was very crowded and the refills were very late. Breakfast didn't go well at all. Since we were roaming around Singapore we stayed in our room for a minimal time, only for sleeping. For which the rooms was actually comfortable. The only advantage of the hotel is the location. Right off Orchard Road for shopping. Overall Staying there for a day or two is OK.

Reviews.Title: “renovated?”
Reviews.Author: mikolopikolo
Reviews.Content: flight got cancelled so we had to book for a hotel for a night. the hotel desk at the airport "suggested" (she highly disagreed with the word "recommended") this hotel as it is newly rennovated according to their booking site. was really too tired so we took her word for it. imagine our surprise when we entered the lobby, is this what you would call renovated? there was no concierge whatsoever, just front desk staff who told us we were upgraded to a room with bigger beds. the elevators were dirty (considering this city is one of the cleanest), I almost forgot we were in Singapore.upon entering the room, noticed that the carpet were really in need of cleaning, entered the bathroom to see that the tub has so much cracks and stains, handle of toilet bowl broken and no hot water coming out of the shower. But that's not the worst part; the beds had mites which we literally saw jumping out once we sat on them! Wanted to move to another hotel had we not been too tired already. The only thing I would say renovated were the wall papers. Other than that, everything including the bed should be changed already. Avoid and go elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible!”
Reviews.Author: cupcakequeen18
Reviews.Content: I have been very fortunate to have travelled to alot of places around the world, but this hotel by far is the worst hotel i have ever come across. I'd stay away from it like the plague if you are thinking of staying in Singapore for more than 3 days. Unfortuantely I couldn't change hotels as I was on a tour. Singapore is a beautiful city but this hotel ruined it slightly. On arrival, we were greeted with a stale smell which stayed all the while we were there. The room was worse, the dust was remarkable on the floors, the A/C did not work at all, which made it difficult to sleep as it was 35oC, the bath was disgusting, all rusty, there was no plug for the sink, toilet flush sounded awful, the shower was a drizzle, shower curtain was mouldy, the wardrobes, dresser and decor is in need of serious updating. The dresser drawer was falling apart, couldnt even pull it out as the whole front would come off, not all the lights were functioning, there was a tv, but the signal was poor so there wasnt really much point in one, the remote had no visible markings any how. The bed wasnt uncomfy, but it moved around the floor alot. Staff were rude, not very child friendly as a member of out tour got told off due to her child crying. The only advantage of the hotel is the location. Right off Orchard Road for shopping. I stayed for 2 nights, could not have coped with staying for more than 2, no way.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay”
Reviews.Author: leen75bk
Reviews.Content: 5 days 4 nights honeymoon stay at this hotel. Warm welcome upon the arrival. The room with good view and spotless. The breakfast with many choice of local food. Excellent services from bellmen, tour service, front desk... Good value for stay

Reviews.Title: “Not too good”
Reviews.Author: NMBDelhi
Reviews.Content: This hotel doesnt have to offer much in terms of comfort. The only positive point of the hotel is that it has a food court just opposite the building. They have small rooms and there wasnt any balcony or opening window in the room. Even the hotel staff is very poor.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay right where the action is in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: wiggytunes
Reviews.Content: Singapore - Oh that great city - images of cleanliness, development, food, multi culturalism and efficiency just spring to mind. I have been rather blessed that I have visited this city several times but there was this one unfullfilled wish - staying away from the Serangoon(little India) area which always made me feel I was in my home town when the whole idea of going abroad really, is to experience new vibes and cultures. Thus on one fine day, while still at Changi airport after disembarking from my flight, I decided to make a beeline for the Orchard road area and namely the Gand Central hotel. (Changi airport is arguably the world's best; now H.K.I.A, chek lap kok of Hong kong has been voted by SKYTRAX as the world's best for 2009 atleast, though Changi has been voted the world's best airport the maximum number of times for several years). The Gand Central Hotel is in a little lane just off the main Orchard road.Orchard road as many would know is the central nerve of the life of the Singaporeans.It is where all the shopping, nightlife and other economic activity is at its max.The hotel is just near this main road and thus offers tourists or business travellers a great mix of comfort and convenience. The hotel offers several facilities.These include a swimming pool, business centre, several restaurants, beauty saloon etc.Specifically, there is a chinese as well as a japanese restaurant that offers all the oriental delicacies. If the entertainment of nearby Orchard road isn't enough, the hotel has karaoke bars and internet cafe/coffee shop facilities to keep you enthralled or say send that all important e-mail.With all the other trappings of a classy hotel such as laundry, health centre etc, this hotel truly has it all. Whats more, SMRT (Singapore Mass Rapid Transport) stations are just a minute or two away on the main Orchard road - Dhoby Ghaut, Somerset and Orchard stations, if my memory serves me right.Thus, the guest is connected to the rest of the megacity just by venturing a little out of his hotel complex. All said and done, I would stay at this hotel once again.No ,not just once again, several times again.Why? Well, the room rates don't punch a hole in the all important wallet.Besides, with an unmatched blend of facilities, class and comforts as well being centrally located along the main shopping belt, this hotel will be my choice for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Sagar S
Reviews.Content: This is a budget hotel less then 25 meters from Orchard Road. There are two MRT/Metro stations and both are equidistant from the Hotel. The Hotel is right in the middle of the shopping and entertainment centers at Orchard Road. I opted for a Superior Room for S$240 (per night) and was disappointed with the condition of the room. The linen was appalling, there was no Locker, several lights not working and problems with the plumbing. There was an Iron Box but no Ironing Board. It left me wondering what was Superior about the room. The superior room had no balcony - just a long windows on the upper half of the wall which cannot be opened. Surprisingly Breakfast closes by 9.30 AM which is early by any standards. When I checked out I was charged for a Bottle of water that I did not consume. The Lobby manager was a pleasing man and he makes up for the grumpy front office staff.

Reviews.Title: “great location - very basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: KarlaLee
Reviews.Content: This hotel is ok!. The rooms are very basic but clean. The breakfast is like a cattlemart and really greasy. It's a cheap hotel in an expensive city so I suppose it's what you'd expect. We were only there for one night so it was fine.

Reviews.Title: “STUFF STOLEN AT THIS HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: mangskymang
Reviews.Content: I really suggest you stay away from this hotel I lost my Oakley shades and the book I brought for reading and the staff was unwilling to accept responsibility!! WORSE hotel I have ever been at!

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel for Singapore Sightseeing/Stopover- Great location”
Reviews.Author: Bombayindian
Reviews.Content: Having stayed here several times, one can say that if the objective is to economize your stay in Singapore and also stay on Orchard road, then this is a decent choice. All amenities are basic, the rooms functional. Loads of eating places around, Orchard street outside, MRT across the road and a functional breakfast buffet. Dont stay here if your aim is luxury but make the most of it if you only need to a place to sleep

Reviews.Title: “Well, it had a roof.”
Reviews.Author: TripFactory
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for 2 nights in November 2009. The overall impression : old and the staff is not very friendly/helpful. I knew it from before I would arrive there (thanks to the reviews). However, the hotelroom gave me a very unsafe feeling. No room-safe, a shabby doorlock and so on. It does not want you to keep anything of value in your room while exploring Singapore. This is the biggest problem I faced with the room. The bathroom was fully functional, but could very urgently do with a facelift. The illumination in the room was poor, the AC had a life of its own and there was a nice modern flatscreen TV with an impressive amount of TV channels showing a rather blurry image. The location on Orchard is super, but as Singapore is a rather small and has very good public transport, I'd strongly advise you to look for a better hotel elsewhere (and some taxi-drivers even agreed with me on that, so don't say I didn't warn you).

Reviews.Title: “Good location basic service”
Reviews.Author: L13m
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel several times. I chose this hotel because of its good location in Orchard road and its reasonable price. Service was basic. Room and bathroom were standard although bit aged, but clean. One challenge in this hotel was its centralized AC which I could not control from my room to adjust the temperature. The AC was too cold for me. Whenever I stayed in this hotel I usually booked room only because to get food outside is very easy. In neighbouring places I could find many food seller with many varieties of foods. There is 711 store in front of Hotel, just walking distance. It is Orchard neighbourhood! I recommend this hotel if you want to explore Singapore and spend most of your time outside hotel considering the rate is affordable and its strategic location.

Reviews.Title: “Basic & adequate for 1 night stop over”
Reviews.Author: journeyManBallarat
Reviews.Content: Brief to my travel agent was three star hotel in Singapore for 1 night stop over. She came up with the Hotel Grand Central. She had stayed in it some time back and said that it wasnt that "flash" but the location was fantastic. Trip Advisor review confirmed the same. Hotel is adequate for a 1 night stop over in Singapore. Caught shuttle from the airport, SIN$9.00 to the hotel and arrived around 7pm. Lobby is busy. Opted not to get internet because had to take 4 hour block and use it at once. Internet cafe was adjacent to the lobby but I can do without it for one night. Room was basic and very dated, but I only wanted somewhere to put my head down and a power point to charge accessories. Toilet cistern leaked and could be heard constantly filling up but was too tired for it to annoy me. Hit the streets for a look down Orchard Road. Ended up eating at the group of "street" eateries adjacent to the hotel. Satay chicken and beer - very nice. Had a hotel voucher for breakfast but checked out without using it. Would stay there again if travelling by myself without the family.

Reviews.Title: “Standard”
Reviews.Author: autumnfairy
Reviews.Content: Well this is not my first time staying in this hotel. I have been here before with my family. This time, I have an internship in an office in Singapore, and I am staying here with my brother. Location is pretty good as it's near bus stop (2mins) and around 7mins walk to the MRT station. Very near Orchard Rd, so it's easy for you who like shopping. I think the service is considered good as the staff are helpful and polite. My early check-in was smooth and they attended to my request seriously. The room was nice size, and the standards facilities were provided. Just that we I moved my bed a bit to accommodate my huge luggage, I found that below the bed, there was some pack of cigarettes and leftover of chocolates. But all the visible places had no problem. Well, I with the price that I pay, I knew that I didn't have the right to expect so high. Anyway overall it was fine:)

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: MiddleM
Reviews.Content: Relocated to Singapore and was booked in here by work.The place is simply dreadful. Usually I can find atleast one redeeming feature but this place failed in every sense. The clientle were dodgy (read perverse), the rooms average, breakfast non-existent (I asked to pay for it and was refused point blank!), staff rude, facilities shot, noise levels in the rooms unbearable. MY first room was opposite the lifts, I asked to move after the first night and sampled 5 further rooms only to find hte lift room as the least noisey - thats saying something!! Like everyone the only positive I can find is the location it's on top of Orchard Road moments from Starbucks (breakfast!), theres a food court opposite which is pretty cheap, if you're after cheap tailoring then its on your door step. Somerset MRT is dead close, as is Orchard Central, Dhoby Ghaut and the cinemas. I was glad to see the back of it and would not go there ever again. If you can afford elsewhere I'd suggest it.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly adequate 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: prw70
Reviews.Content: Had to go on a flying visit to Singapore recetly and as did not have a huge amount of time needed somehwere central and close to Orchard Road. With the deal I received I decided to stay here. I was wary after having read all the negative reviews but needed the location and the proximity to Orchard Road. Check in was fine and smooth. The room itself ( I stayed in a Deluxe room ) was large but a tad sparsely furnished. Bathroom was ok ( would have preferred a bath tub but not shower ok ) Buffet Breakfast. As has been said previously not a large selection but it was hot and perfectly ok to eat. Apparently there is a swimming pool but did not visit so cannot comment. Called housekeeping and they brought what I requested after about 25 minutes. All in all it is as the title suggests a perfectly reasonable 3 star property and the location is superb. If travelling with children you may want to take note that it is next to one of Orchard Road's more salubrious shopping centres with items for sales that are adult only.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but could do with a facelift”
Reviews.Author: lecteuravide
Reviews.Content: We had a room on the 9th floor with a window that looked straight onto a huge wall of another building. Not that I necessarily want a million dollar view but a big blank wall is sort of depressing - like a view from prison. The room was clean although the bathroom could have been a bit better (mould on the back of the door, shower curtain needing a good soak). The shower head and water pressure made showering a challenge. Our pre-paid breakfast was pretty awful - the food was of very cheap quality - jam that tasted like chemicals, congee that was almost water, tea and coffee undrinkable and lukewarm. They seem to have bought the cheapest quality of everything. The staff were indifferent in their attitude. I asked in reception if someone could phone an airport shuttle bus company and the guy just pointed at a public phone over the way. Very un-Singapore. Location is great though and it is not an expensive hotel. Would I stay there again? No. Singapore has plenty more to offer with good price and location at better quality.

Reviews.Title: “Room was smelly and had bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: alvaliant
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Grand Central for 1 night with my mom and my aunt. The room was smelly - smell like Indian curry. In fact the whole corridor was smelly. We could not control the aircon temperature since it was a central aircon. So we were freezing in the middle of the night. The pillows were old and thin, and the worst part, three of us had itches in the morning. We suspect it was bed bugs. My case was the worst. Aunt and mother "only" got red swollen eyelids and itches in some spots while my eyes are swollen and my face and neck are all red, itchy and feels thick (I'm still recovering, went back home 2 days ago). NOT RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Place”
Reviews.Author: chintanshah9
Reviews.Content: Worst place to stay in......with the worst conditions of living.....would never recommend any one for this hotel...it is on orchad road but not worth it...

Reviews.Title: “Ideal accomodation for busy tourists”
Reviews.Author: Laulz
Reviews.Content: From the previous reviews, I was so worried about this hotel that I packed disinfectants wipes and spray with me. However, as the taxi dropped us off at the entrance, I was surprised. The entrance is bright and clean, lacks charm but clean and decent. Paid 440 sg dollars for 6 nights so can't complain. Check in was quick and easy. We were on the 9th floor. Pleasantly surprised with room. As soon as I entered it, I checked the bed sheets and the bathroom. Spotless! Was very happy and relieved. The room was clean, the furniture was fine. Don't understand how some find it old and tired looking. It wasn't brand new obviously but was definitely not as bad as described. The bathroom could do with some updating but it was clean, and that's all that mattered. The only complaint I have is the room's a/c. It took ages for it to cool and as it automatically turns off when you leave, the room was always hot when you first got in. Breakfast wasn't included in our deal so can't review. Hawkers right outside, there's a tv there as well so late at night, had supper and a few drinks while watching live soccer matches. I'd definitely recommend this place for people who just need a place to sleep and relax. For the price, it is a mighty fine place.

Reviews.Title: “Average Room Experience, Excellent Location.”
Reviews.Author: RahulKhera
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel twice (both times within the same package trip), and the first time I was given a room on the 7th floor. This room was old looking and dirty, hadn't even been cleaned up after the previous occupant left. I called the room service, and they were there to promptly clean the room. Just the one night I spent was depressing in this room. The second time was much better, the room that I got was on the 3rd floor, and was really very good in comparison to the one on the 7th floor. I think they have renovated the rooms floor wise, and all rooms on the lower floors are better than the ones on the higher floors. Ofcourse, the location of this hotel is excellent for any purpose you can imagine. It's right in the center of Orchard Road, and cheaper markets like Little India and China town are also less than 10 mins MRT ride. The Dhoby Ghaut MRT station is the nearest one to this hotel. Cabs are expensive there, so I'd recommend the MRT which is in quite a good shape. I would stay in this hotel again for its value for money, considering the excellent location. And ofcourse, try for rooms on the 2nd or 3rd floor.

Reviews.Title: “Services not up to the mark”
Reviews.Author: bangaloretrekker
Reviews.Content: Hotel grand central is located very close to many of the best shopping malls in Singapore, and this is the only thing good about the hotel. The rooms are average at best and the staff are not friendly enough. The worst thing I found about the hotel is that they don't provide WiFi internet service, which is freely available in many other hotels at the same rate. They don' t even serve free water in the rooms and the even the TV connection was not working properly.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay - Rooms smell and dirty”
Reviews.Author: eerat
Reviews.Content: Good location that is all - paid for 4 Breakfasts and after Breakfast 1 did not return - dined on Orchard Street Counter Staff rude and not friendly Very old Furniture and dingy rooms a Back Packers Hostel would be better

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: KipperMelbourne
Reviews.Content: A good basic hotel, clean, centrally/ideally located, very friendly and helpful staff. The buffet breakfast was excellent. The aircon was noisy and traffic noise intruded but didn't detract from the overall stay. Certainly good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for at least a 3 star hotel, don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: BirkdaleTourist
Reviews.Content: We had the pleasure of 2 seperate stays at this Hotel during the past 6 weeks There is nothing to like about this Hotel at all apart from its location Bathroom dirty Furniture old and dirty The Breakfast Room and quality of Breakfast terrible Bath Towels are that thin they are ready to tear apart Reception Staff unhelpful Only person worth a mention was the Porter! Swimming Pool no shade available at all Other guests I spoke to had exactly the same opinion And we were upgraded to a bettter room! Don't stay here!!

Reviews.Title: “Simple but nice”
Reviews.Author: tuan_55
Reviews.Content: had a great stay at this hotel. was a very simple hotel, but was very nice. located very centrally (hence the name!), polite and helpful staff. would stay here again and would recommend to people going to stay in the land of sling-lish!

Reviews.Title: “THE GRAND”
Reviews.Author: VIMII
Reviews.Content: The Grand Central is situated off Orchard Road and is very conveniently located to the business district and shooping malls of Singapore. The hotel has rooms which are slightly old and the interiors need an upgrade. The restaurant where the complimantary buffetbreakfast is served is very crowded at all times and it is and exercvise to get a seat during the peak hours. We need to stand in a queue to get our breeakfast and when we reach the area, most of the foodstuff is over and then wait again. Service is courteous but can be a bit more friendly.

Reviews.Title: “loved the location”
Reviews.Author: laxmilobo
Reviews.Content: Bang on Orchard Road, and yet inexpensive... thats the draw here... but its unclean by Singapore Standards,and not much of service to speak of....so if ur on your own budget, on work and preferably alone then this is the hotel for you!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the location and its surroundings”
Reviews.Author: RaviDabral
Reviews.Content: Centrally located from business point of view. All commercial places are close by. Shopping malls are near in Orchard Road. Most importantly its cheap and best. Services are excellent.

Reviews.Title: “"A nice hotel for my standard..."”
Reviews.Author: Lincs_007
Reviews.Content: Good evening fellow travellers! I would just like to make a comment as to regards the feedbacks with this hotel. We stayed here last May 6-10, 2009 (5D4N). Since people here have made negative feedbacks about the hotel, I didn't expect much. I just considered the location and accessibility of the hotel (the cheapest one i think along Orchard road). When we went in, the staffs were accomodating. =p they really assisted us all the way to our room. After seeing the room, I was quite relief. The room was clean. We had 3 beds indeed. I checked the bathroom cause people here mentioned the CRs were untidy, I think that's not true in our case. Our CR (though of course not very spacious) was good enough for me. Anyway you wont be sleeping in a bath tub.=p The room was well-kempt... linens were new. TV was cool (though I think only one channel was shown). I want to commend the tour desk of the hotel. She was so accomodating and helpful. She even gave us tips on how to save for our money in going from one place to another. The prices of the tours being offered are fair enough for me. The daily breakfasts were almost the same everyday. Nevertheless it's really up to you if you like to eat everything (since it was buffet type) or you just want to taste little by little. I think my fellow asian friends would appreciate the food. They were ok for me... =p IF you like to save some money then you can also try the fast food at the basement of Concorde hotel just across the mini-street of Hotel grand central. They're really cheap. Location wise, very accessible to public transportation and shopping malls along Orchard Road. Overall I found the place great! Good thing I tried this place.

Reviews.Title: “slightly disappointed”
Reviews.Author: anoopsuri
Reviews.Content: This was our second entry into singapore, for both stays I had selected two different hotels. The website showed very nice rooms and we selected the Premium Promotion offering a Good discount. This was a Little let down as the room and bathroom were no where near the Premium Category (Except for the LCD TV in the room which showed only one English Channel). After placing an Extra Bed there was no way would could move around it was so small (I am just wondering what will be a Non-Premium room like) The Staff at Reception was Nice the GM was considerate enough to have allowed us the late checkout at 5 PM without Charges. The Location was superb right at one end of orchard Road and you can just shop around. A Hawkers corner is right front ofthe Hotel and you can enjoy good local food here at low prices.

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel almost ruined our entire trip”
Reviews.Author: Bharateiya
Reviews.Content: We choose this hotel for its location. Its 10 mts off orchard road and very central to what he had to do. Other than this, everything about this hotel made me sick. I stayed here for 10 days in June 2007 with my wife and two kids. Room and Bath The room was poorly maintained, the sliding cupboard came off its guideway the first time we used it; the hand shower leaked; the hot water tap wouldn't do anything for a few rotation and came out full flow in the next rotation. Rooms were not cleaned everyday. We had to request one old chinese cleaner through sign language to clean our room everyday. He would make faces but finally would do it. Yet you could make out it was a half hearted effort, there was dirt under the bed, etc. Room Service NON EXISTENT. And Housekeeping do not bother to provide you with anything that you might ask for and when they do it comes after 2 hours on an average. Breakfast The most horrid breakfast buffet I have seen. Cold omelette's probably made the night before or atleast 3-4 hours prior to when they are served, and bread. My 2 year old daughter wanted to take a couple of french fries with her in her hand outside the dining, the rude lady manager refused to let her out. I told her she must be mentally sick to stop a child from carrying two pieces of french fries, and she tried to lecture me about the rules of the hotel. She needs psychiatric help. Staff Rude to the core. They think they are doing a favor to you by letting you stay in your hotel. The arrogant, dictatorial lady manager of their breakfast lounge needs psychiatric help. She is mean. We had a wonderful trip to Singapore in all other respects, but, we will never ever stay at this hotel again. For that matter, I shall avoid their entire chain of hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT come here”
Reviews.Author: ksanyee
Reviews.Content: We have spent 5 nights in this hotel. The reception staff was never available, wasnt friendly and wasnt helpful at all. They nearly got offended every time when, entering the lobby, we said hello to them. The hotel lobbz is terrible, with a reallz bad atmosphere. The rooms are like youth hostel dorms in Bulgaria 35-40 years ago. Bed sheet is dirty, the room is dark, TV doesnt work. We got our TV fixed after asking the staff 3 times during 2 days. Location is good but nothing more to say as positive. I have been traveling for 40 years now, I have been to Singapore more than 20 times. Its one of the most wonderful cities in the world, the best schoice to travel to. BUT PLEASE pay a few bucks more and get a decent accomodation. - We stayed a night at the hotel right next to this one, called Holiday Inn, but we had to change out hotel since that would have costed a bit more and we were on a budget travel. So that hotel is something you would expect from a city like Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap Accomodation + Great Location = Happy Traveller”
Reviews.Author: samlovestotravel
Reviews.Content: Hotel Grand Central is a good place to stay if you are in a budget and looking for a decent place to stay. Then I guess this is the place for you. If you are not choosy, this place is perfect. It's really near Orchard Rd which makes it an easy access to everything (malls, fast food, restaurants etc.) We arrived early. Checking in is easy. Internet Kiosks is available at the Hotel Lobby. S$1.00/15 mins and Printer is also available for S$.50/page. MRT station is far from the hotel, nearest station is Dhoby Ghaut.

Reviews.Title: “Killer Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bluetiger22
Reviews.Content: While checking in, 2 staff were busy talking. Went to the next staff, only to be told to refer to the 2 staff. The room was dirty and leaking. The aircon was very-very cold. I had to sleep with 3 T-Shirts and 2 pants with socks. We were practically freezing to death. I bought a thermostat and found the room temperature was below 5 degress celcius! It was sleeping in a freezer! Told the receptionist about the problem. Their answer was - it is central airconditioning and will sent the Maintenance guys to check! None came. We continued to stay ina freezer! Its a killer hotel! The toilets are dirty and filty. Lot of cockroaches during their rounds at night [must be night watchmen!] The linen smells and the beds are old. At 6.30 am we were awaken by construction works. Disturbed our sleep! Breakfast was hell! It was held at a converted banquet room with large tables. No table setting. Stayed for 4 days - same food - noodles, small cuts of chicken sausages, eggs, bread, fruits. Had to wait 10 minutes for refill of the noodles. No proper system of refilling the food. The short chinese lady staff who was at the entrance was rude to many customers. I saw with my own eyes. She would chase those who entered without geting their cards endorsed and rudely asked for their cards. Those who left for the toilet and return were rudely told they cannot do it! She was like a tiger! There is no coffee house for late suppers. The bell-boy was very uncooperative. I was carrying a few shopping bags with my wife. The bell-boy saw us entering the hotel, did not open the doors but turned his head away. But these bell-boys were fast top grab our bags during check-in to get some tips! Hungry for money! I had booked the botel together with the Air Asia package and they charge us RM438 per night whereas on their website they only charge RM336.00 per night. No wonder Air Asia have delisted this hotel from their website. I had just checked the Air Asia website. The only thing good about the hotel is it is near the Dhobby Ghaut and Somerset MRT. That is about all. My comment - don''t stay at the hotel if that is the only hotel in Singapore! Its a killer hotel - avoid it at any cost!

Reviews.Title: “Love it. Good service. Good location.”
Reviews.Author: globetrotterdreamer
Reviews.Content: My family and I reached the hotel early and they are kind enough to allow us to check in early. by early i mean 7/8 smtg in the morning. their services are very good. the room my family and i stayed in is the premium room. very comfortable and clean. the location is also very good. shopping malls and food stores are just a stone throw away.

Reviews.Title: “Unbeliable Horrified!”
Reviews.Author: iococanada
Reviews.Content: Been staying in this hotel before, it was disappoited the first time, but this time i was almost fainted when we first walk in to the room, you must hold your breath, it was horrible smell, even we tried to open the window for hours, the rotten smell remains. bathroom is filthy, hairs are everywhere, yellow stain and dark spot is in the bath tub, there.. you might figure out yourself how bad is the bed sheet.. I don't even want to mention about it. Customer service is lousy, shower tap doesn't works properly, inconsistant cold water and hot water will just attack you without your notice.. complaint to the front desk, nothing is done... wondering why Singapore goverement doesn't have the standard for the hotel operation, since everyone "KNOWS" how clean is the city, "ya, they are pretty impressive when you are walking in the street or even to the park, they are really clean" why left the accommodation so horrifying?? By reading thro most of traveller review, this hotel must really consider to rebuild or do some really serious BIG TIME renovation inorder for the traveller to return for second time. Paying that kind of money for the accommodation, I rather go to Combodia instate. at least the accommodation is cheaper and much more cleaner .. if for medical reason, well, guess you don't have the choice but to surfer the experience. For holiday reason, I would never return for the second time. Good luck to you all

Reviews.Title: “Cheap value hotel”
Reviews.Author: krkchn
Reviews.Content: This hotel is for travelers on a budget. The room is clean, the comfort room is clean. There is a TV, but no cable. It is indirectly in front of orchard road. It is around the end of orchard road. I don't think you need the best hotel when traveling around, well, once in a while is good, though. Most of the time, you spend your time on the road, and most of the time in the hotel is spent on sleeping. I think you get value for your money in this hotel. I mean, where in orchard do you find a hotel priced at just around 200 dollars (Except for the next review I'm going to make.)? Checking in was a bit longer though as there were a lot of people since it is the peak season.

Reviews.Title: “i have only one word to express this hotel 'Real [--]'”
Reviews.Author: DASINDIA
Reviews.Content: We went for a whole trip of FAR EAST. And the biggest “sore” in our whole trip was the accommodation provided in Singapore Grand Central. The rooms were small and stinking and the bathrooms were worn out and leaking. Over and above this their breakfast was horrible. We had breakfast only two days in Grand Central and for rest of the days we had to go to good restaurants outside paying from our pocket. We do not recommend this hotel to anyone who is travelling with family and please do take up our grievance to your Singapore counterpart.

Reviews.Title: “Nice budget hotel , liked it and will go again and again :)”
Reviews.Author: newindian
Reviews.Content: Hi Frds, I booked this hotel at agoda.com the best onling hotel booking site with 24hrs online chat support !! I read many negative reviews abt the hotel and was very worried. This was the only budget hotel available at my booking dates. It took only 20min from airport to reach the hotel, we took taxi frm airport and they charged us just 19.60 SGD On arrival the checkin was "SUPER QUICK". The hotel looked cool .. frm outside and the lobby was also very nice. Now i was worried abt the room coz i read several negative reviews abt the hotel. When i opened the room i was more than SURPRISED . It was very perfect ... Too good to be true for the price we paid. The room was very spacious , we booked tipple sharing room for 3 nights and 4 days it costed us 504 USD with breakfast. In bathroom there was hairdryer, bath tub (a little bit bad condition but was okay and clean to take bath). Toothbrushes with toothpaste , slippers , soap, shampoo and shower gel was included. The towels were clean. We stayed at 7th floor room no. 765. Electric kettle in the room was not working. Few drawbacks : Hotel do not provide water, they sell water and in rooms you have to pay for it if you want it. Please do remember that you have to deposit 50SGD in advance at the time of checkin for mini bar that is refundable at the tiem of checkout. You will love the location as the hotel is next to orchard plaza.. ALL OVER FANTASTIC STAY MORE THAN EXPECTED I LOVED IT ... THE HOTEL IS EXCELLENT BUDGET HOTEL. PLEASE DO NOT HESSITATE TO GO YOU WILL FIND IT VERY GOOD.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, old, noisy, disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: Wayfarer35
Reviews.Content: I was ready to write a bad review of this hotel, but I see everyone beat me to it. If there were such thing as a 1-star establishment (is there?), this would be it. The front desk staff was reasonably nice and efficient. Check-in was quick and painless. Unfortunately, our hotel room was old, dirty, freezing cold and small. The furniture and sheets looked as if they hadn't been cleaned in years. It was noisy all day and night. Thank goodness I brought earplugs so I could partially drown out the yelling in the hallway. I wanted to wear flip flops while taking a shower - the bathroom was that disgusting. The breakfast buffet the first day was so gross and unsanitary that I skipped it the next day. The only good thing about this place is its central location to shops. I used a travel agent to book my hotels in Singapore and KL. Maybe I should find another agent because both hotels he put me in were filthy.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: luca6504
Reviews.Content: I was there end of August 2008, the only good thing is the location.People are unfriendly at the reception and only interested in doing the talking among themselves, the aircondition is centralized so during the night I was freezing and I had no opportunity to lower the temperature or switch it off:No pool available, no fitness center available, no breakfast included in the price (210 sgd)very old hotel, very poor service.

Reviews.Title: “A Nightmare Stay To Remeber For Life”
Reviews.Author: tanwinson
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel in Singapore as I've search through a lot of other hotels. Seriously considering Singapore a tourist attraction, i don't really think that the hotel rate are cheap. They are very high priced and it is not worth for us to pay for even a night stay. My story will tell you why. I arrived from Malaysia on 18th July 2008 at the wee hours of the Friday by a coach that alighted at Goldenmile complex. I was greeted by a taxi driver which drove a Sports Mercedes Benz. I told him that I've just arrived from Malaysia and needed to go to a money changer. He greeted me warmly and told me that he would be more than pleased to sent me to Mustafa Center which is open 24/7. I got my money changed and he then drove me to the Grand Central Hotel. We chatted all along the way to the hotel. I have to admit that in Singapore, you will pay a bomb for taxi services but rest assured you will be pleased with their warm service and polite attitude. I arrived at Grand Central Hotel approximately around 5 a.m. Before i forget, i've made a reservation for a room by credit card and called them to inquire about early arrival arrangements. I was greeted by a front office officer which is half asleep. He merely greeted me with his eyes half open while adjusting his spectacles. I passed him my booking conformation print out and he looked at it. He told me that i was too early and needed to wait until 7 a.m to try again. I have no choice but to accept his explanations. He did not even offer me to safe keep my luggage when i leave the counter front. I was then approached by the concierge who offered me to place my bags in the safe room area. I am in Singapore for a 2 nights stay in this hotel with my wife.
